page.title: 13STREET GAMES
page.content:
{Stuck in the Mud}
You need at least 3 people to play this game.The person who is "on" counts to 10.When he has finished counting,he runs after someone.When he has caught him,the person who has been "tug" stands still with his legs wide open.The person who is "on" goes after another person or he can guard the person who is caught.When you guard someone it is called "guarding your chicken".The other players can free the person who is caught by going under his legs.The person who is "on" has to "tig" everyone and then someone else is "on".
